title: Interview with Dr. Sian Lewis
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Sian Lewis, an associate lecturer of Criminology and Sociology at The University of Roehampton. Sian explains about her ethnographic research into the issue of sexual harassment on the London underground and the experiences that many females face on their journeys and daily commutes.
